name: Boom! Duck?
description:
This is BOOM DUCK! it's a classic, retro game.

Info:

Evil Duckmon (which Icoso likes for some reason?) and his minions are exploding the world so he can be the leader! So you need to kill the minions and the Duckmon clones.

How To Play:

Basically, this game you are a DUCK with a CANNON and you explode all of the evil duckies. 

Reviews:

This game has been rated 10/10 by Duck Magazine and *radio silence* by IGN!
